ISSUE.TITLE: Hide "default value" input for attributes
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.30 RC When you edit any attribute (checkout, product, vendor, address, customer) in admin area and change "attribute types", then "default value" is always displayed. It should be hidden for some attributes (like it was done in 4.00 or below)

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Minor refactoring of the installation process

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #4686 Hide default value when change attribute type
